DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Fenberg&Roy_Dryad
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Demographic and life history data collected in the field for 10 populations of the intertidal limpet, Lottia gigantea, from southern and central California. Data include size frequency distributions, historical size distributions from Los Angeles county, size (age) at sex change information, growth rates, and mortality measurements.
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: Conservation biology
Demography
